# templates

**Instance Property**

The contents of the navigation hierarchy.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var templates: [CPTemplate] { get }
```

## Accessing Templates

- **rootTemplate**: The root template in the navigation hierarchy.
- **topTemplate**: The top-most template in the navigation hierarchy.
